image.title: Sara & Jonathan, Capri
image.description: "Professional, helpful and approachable; I would definitely recommend Ionian Weddings to anyone"

image.title: Hannah & Paul, Skiathos
image.description: "What an absolutely wonderful wedding we have just come back from in Skiathos, our friends and family are raving about how this has been one of the most magical weddings they have attended"

image.title: Natalie & Chris, Santorini
image.description: "We had the most amazing wedding in Santorini, I actually want to have the day all over again just to see all the guests faces. All thanks to the Ionian team.! Natalie & Chris X"

image.title: Naomi and Mike, Santorini
image.description: "The beach bar is an incredible venue and took our breath away! Thank you so much for everything!"

image.title: Emma & Ian, Corfu
image.description: "We truly believe it was the passion of Jane and Andreas that made the difference and the personal touch in taking time to understand us, our personalities and our dream."

image.title: Rachael & David, Zante
image.description: "Where do we start with what you have done for us? Your communications and dedication made our wedding day as special as it was and I will highly recommend you to anyone. Thank you so much!"

image.title: Nicola & Paul, Kefalonia
image.description: "We were left with fond memories of an emotional day and a simple, uncomplicated experience"

image.title: Angela & Ed, Cyprus
image.description: "Thank you! We had such a fantastic day, way beyond our dreams! If we could do it all again we wouldnt change a thing!"

image.title: Jo & Neil, Santorini
image.description: "A huge thank you for organising everything to make our big day just the way we imagined"

image.title: Amy & Matthew, Zante
image.description: "Turtle Island was amazing, absolutely stunning and exceeded all my expectations, it was the perfect day!"
